net.rptools.maptool.model.Token.name: Lib:GURPS
net.rptools.maptool.model.Token.notes:
Keep this token on one of the maps of the campaign file! It contains the macros that make this framework run.
The material presented here is my original creation, intended for use with the GURPS system from Steve Jackson Games. This material is not official and is not endorsed by Steve Jackson Games.
GURPS is a trademark of Steve Jackson Games, and its rules and art are copyrighted by Steve Jackson Games. All rights are reserved by Steve Jackson Games. This game aid is the original creation of Winter and is released for free distribution, and not for resale, under the permissions granted in the Steve Jackson Games Online Policy (http://www.sjgames.com/general/online_policy.html).

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Setting up old inventory of items and incoming new item. --> [h:oldInventory=getProperty("inventory")] [h:newItem=json.fromStrProp(macro.args)]
<!-- Remove the itemIndexChosen from the newItem, as it's needed only to identify the item we're working with in this macro, and should not be saved with the changed item. --> [h:newItem=json.remove(newItem,"itemIndexChosen")]
<!-- Adding ID to new item, and incrementing nextItemID for the next item added. --> [h:itemID=getLibProperty("nextItemID","Lib:GURPS")] [h:setLibProperty("nextItemID",itemID+1,"Lib:GURPS")]
[h:itemIDObj=json.set("{}","ID",itemID)] [h:newItem=json.merge(newItem, itemIDObj)]
<!-- Adding indexed new item to the old inventory, and storing in token property. Recalculate encumbrance, if necessary.--> [h:inventory=json.append(oldInventory, newItem)]
[macro("calcEnc@"+ getMacroLocation()):""]
[MACRO("CharSheet@" + getMacroLocation()): "tab=Inventory"]

<!-- Storing in token property.-->
[h:currManeuver=newManeuver)]

[h:HP=getProperty("HP")]

};{}]

};{}]

<!-- receives variables - defType, defItem, defLevel, manDefBonusTotal, posture, retreat, miscMod -->
<!-- Setting up weapon variables from arguments -->
[h:args=json.fromStrProp(macro.args)]
[h:defType=json.get(args,"defType")]
[h:defItem=json.get(args,"defItem")]
[h:defLevel=json.get(args,"defLevel")]
[h:manDefBonusTotal=json.get(args,"manDefBonusTotal")]
[h:postureMod=json.get(args,"postureMod")]
[h:retreat=json.get(args,"retreat")]
[h:miscMod=json.get(args,"miscMod")]

<!-- Determining effective skill, rolling, and calculating margin of success or failure.-->
[h:defEffSkill=defLevel+manDefBonusTotal+postureMod+miscMod]
[h:roll=3d6]

<!-- Setting up output -->
[h, if ( retreat == 1 ): retreatPhrase= "falls back, and" ; retreatPhrase= ""]
[switch(defType), h, code:
case "Dodge": {
   [h:verbPhrase = "dodge"]
   [h:verbPhraseConj = "dodged"]
};
case "Parry": {
   [h:verbPhrase = "parry"]
   [h:verbPhraseConj = "parried"]
};
case "Block": {
   [h:verbPhrase = "block"]
   [h:verbPhraseConj = "blocked"]
};
default: {
   error.
}]

[h:miscDBTemp=0]

<!--Output results -->
[r:retreatPhrase] tries to [r:verbPhrase][r,s,g: " with effective skill " + defEffSkill +", and rolls a " + roll].

[h: mark=getSelected()] [h, token(mark): target=getName()] [h: input( "numDice|0|# of Explosion dice", "exMult|1|Explosion Multiplier", "exbon|0|Explosion Damage Bouns", "fragDice|0|# of Fragmentation Dice", "tarDist|0|Distance from Explosion", "tarSize|0|Target Size Modifier") ] [h: tarDist = if(tarDist == 0, 1/3, tarDist)] [h: ConDam = (eval(numDice + "d6") * exMult)/(3*tarDist)] [r: target] takes [r: floor(ConDam)] points of concussion damage.
[h: distMod = 0] [h: distMod = if(tarDist>2,-1,distMod)] [h: distMod = if(tarDist>3,-2,distMod)] [h: distMod = if(tarDist>5,-3,distMod)] [h: distMod = if(tarDist>7,-4,distMod)] [h: distMod = if(tarDist>10,-5,distMod)] [h: distMod = if(tarDist>15,-6,distMod)] [h: distMod = if(tarDist>20,-7,distMod)] [h: distMod = if(tarDist>30,-8,distMod)] [h: distMod = if(tarDist>50,-9,distMod)] [h: distMod = if(tarDist>70,-10,distMod)] [h: distMod = if(tarDist>100,-11,distMod)] [h: distMod = if(tarDist>150,-12,distMod)] [h: HitRoll = 0 - 3d6 + 15 + distMod + tarSize] [h: FragHits = if(HitRoll > -1,(floor(HitRoll/3)+1),0)] [h: FragHits = if(tarDist>(fragDice*5),0,FragHits)] [h: FragHits = if(tarDist>200,0,FragHits)] [WHILE (FragHits>0, ""), CODE: { [r: target] takes [r: eval(fragDice+"d6")] cutting points of damage from a fragmentation hit.
[h: FragHits=FragHits-1] } ]
